00029 CSwordVerseKey::CSwordVerseKey( CSwordModuleInfo* module ) : CSwordKey(module) {
00030 }

00044 CSwordKey* CSwordVerseKey::copy() const {
00045     CSwordVerseKey* k = new CSwordVerseKey(*this);
00046     return k;
00047 }
00048 
00050 CSwordModuleInfo* CSwordVerseKey::module( CSwordModuleInfo* newModule ){
00051     if (newModule && (newModule->type() == CSwordModuleInfo::Bible || newModule->type() == CSwordModuleInfo::Commentary) ) {
00052         const QString& oldKey   = key();
00053         m_module = newModule;
00054         key(oldKey);
00055     }
00056     return m_module;
00057 }
00058 
00060 const QString CSwordVerseKey::book( const QString& newBook ) {
00061 //  qWarning("CSwordVerseKey::book( const QString& newBook )");
00062     int min = 0;
00063     int max = 1;
00064     
00065     if (!newBook.isEmpty()) {
00066         CSwordBibleModuleInfo* bible = dynamic_cast<CSwordBibleModuleInfo*>(module());
00067         const bool hasOT = bible->hasTestament(CSwordBibleModuleInfo::OldTestament);        
00068         const bool hasNT = bible->hasTestament(CSwordBibleModuleInfo::NewTestament);
00069         if (hasOT && hasNT) {
00070             min = 0;
00071             max = 1;
00072         }
00073         else if (hasOT && !hasNT) {
00074             min = 0;
00075             max = 0;
00076         }
00077         else if (!hasOT && hasNT) {
00078             min = 1;
00079             max = 1;
00080         }
00081                 
00082         bool finished = false;
00083         for (int testament = min; testament <= max && !finished; ++testament) {
00084             for (int book = 0; book < BMAX[testament] && !finished; ++book) {
00085                 if ( !strcmp((const char*)newBook.local8Bit(),books[testament][book].name ) ) {
00086                     Testament(testament+1);
00087                     Book(book+1);
00088                     finished = true;
00089                 }
00090             }
00091         }
00092     }
00093     if ( Testament()> 0 && Testament() <=2 && Book() <= BMAX[Testament()-1] )
00094         return QString::fromLocal8Bit( books[Testament()-1][Book()-1].name );
00095     return QString::fromLocal8Bit( books[min][0].name ); //return the first book, i.e. Genesis
00096 }
00097 
00099 const QString CSwordVerseKey::key( const QString& newKey ){ 
00100     if (!newKey.isEmpty()) {
00101         VerseKey::operator = ((const char*)newKey.local8Bit());
00102     }
00103     return QString::fromLocal8Bit((const char*)*this);//don't use fromUtf8 here!
00104 }
00105 
00106 void CSwordVerseKey::key( const char* newKey ){
00107     if (newKey) {
00108         VerseKey::operator = (newKey);
00109     }
00110 }
00111 
00112 const bool CSwordVerseKey::next( const JumpType type ) {
00113     switch (type) {
00114         case UseBook: {
00115             if (Book() <= 0 || Book() >= BMAX[Testament()-1] && Testament() > 1)
00116                 return false;       
00117             Book(Book()+1);
00118             return true;
00119         }
00120         case UseChapter: {
00121             Chapter(Chapter()+1);       
00122             return true;
00123         }
00124         case UseVerse: {
00125         if (m_module && m_module->module()) {
00126             const char* oldLang = 0;
00127 //          if (m_module->module()->Lang() != getLocale()) {
00128 //              oldLang = m_module->module()->Lang();
00129 //              m_module->module()->Lang(getLocale());
00130 //          }
00131             m_module->module()->SetKey(this);   //use this key as base for the next one!    
00132             (*(m_module->module()) )++;
00133             if (!m_module->module()->Error())       
00134                 key( QString::fromLocal8Bit(m_module->module()->KeyText()) );//don't use fromUtf8
00135 //          if (oldLang)
00136 //              m_module->module()->Lang(oldLang);
00137         }
00138         else
00139           Verse(Verse()+1);
00140         return true;        
00141         }
00142         default:    
00143             return false;
00144     };
00145 };
00146 
00147 const bool CSwordVerseKey::previous( const JumpType type ) {
00148     switch (type) {
00149         case UseBook: {
00150             if (Book()<=1 || Book() > BMAX[Testament()-1] && Testament() > 1)
00151                 return false;
00152             Book(Book()-1);
00153             return true;
00154         }
00155         case UseChapter: {
00156             Chapter(Chapter()-1);
00157             return true;        
00158         }
00159         case UseVerse: {
00160 //          const char* oldLang = 0;
00161 //          if (m_module->module()->Lang() != getLocale()) {
00162 //          oldLang = m_module->module()->Lang();
00163 //          m_module->module()->Lang(getLocale());
00164 //          }
00165         if (m_module && m_module->module()) {
00166             m_module->module()->SetKey(this);   //use this key as base for the next one!            
00167             ( *( m_module->module() ) )--;
00168             if (!m_module->module()->Error())
00169                 key( QString::fromLocal8Bit(m_module->module()->KeyText()) );//don't use fromUtf8
00170 //          if (oldLang)
00171 //              m_module->module()->Lang(oldLang);              
00172         }
00173         else
00174             Verse(Verse()-1);
00175         
00176         return true;        
00177         }
00178         default:    
00179             return false;
00180     };
00181 };
